I would say Moat (Our robot’s name) did pretty well. For Mason, we plan on adding Limelight to our robot, yet the most I’ve done with Limelight last year was getting the IDs of Apriltags. This year I plan on utilising Limelight with Pathplanner to have our Autonomous working better than last year. Yet I don’t know how to. Any help would be, well,
